ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] twisting troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: RAM RAM RAM...I played on a Viper v550 for a LOOOONG time.  That isint a bad card at ALL... the thing is that video card techjnology has jumped so far SO
ygData.messageBody:
RAM RAM RAM...I played on a Viper v550
for a LOOOONG time. That isint a bad card at ALL...
the thing is that video card techjnology has jumped so far SO fast..
you can do a LOT worse than the v550.

However, if you want to increase performance...RAM is teh WAY to go.

after upgrading to 128MB from....32MB (ack!) my whole world changed.

I used to eave the room to get drinks while zoning...now I zone in under
20 seconds usually ( well mabey a bit higher in some zones...)


RAM is good. Get RAM..:)


----- Original Message -----
From: Kevin L. Crawford <Lyrnia@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 3:25 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] twisting troubles


> Heh yep if that's a 3d NOW system then it's more than likely your RAM.
I'd
> also consider the video card but the 3DNOW should take care of any
> insufficiencies in the display adaptor.
>
> Go to 128mb of RAM and you'll notice a pretty dramatic improvement.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 4:09 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] twisting troubles
